## Interest in the Course

Nice to meet all of you smart, daring and ambitious peers!  As with many of you, I'm involved in projects with public entities such as the Department of Child Safety and even the Children's Bureau. This requires an ability to my transform my research conducted with stakeholder data into reports that are easily understood by the public.
